title: The Marlowe Conspiracy
description: 1593, Elizabethan England: With his life on the line and the clock ticking, playwright/spy Christopher Marlowe teams up with William Shakespeare to uncover a high-level government conspiracy. Together, they race through Marlowe's tangled life of crime and espionage to expose the conspiracy and save him from the hangman's noose... But will anything save a man as troubled as Marlowe?
author: M.G. Scarsbrook
